DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the safety and technical feasibility of implanting the Latella Implant System in the treatment of patients with medial osteoarthritis of the knee.
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility of the Latella Implant System for Medial Osteoarthritis (OA)
DOC.criteria: History of pain as due to medial osteoarthritis Rheumatoid arthritis Joint or ligament instability Metal ion allergy
